welcome_message_body: Welcome to Edmonton, Canada! Get ready to experience the city's unique blend of urban charm and natural beauty, known for its vibrant arts scene, stunning river valley, and friendly locals. We hope you have a fantastic time exploring all that Edmonton has to offer.
